Articles.Content: Is that a rep request in your sig? Cheater!
claiming to be a VIP? Only VIP's can decide who else can be a VIP you cheater!

"Location: Kerbin, Mun, Minmus [...]"

CHEATER! YOU CANNOT BE AT MULTIPLE PLACES AT ONCE!
Incomplete sig image? CHEATER! We all know that sig limits dimensions!
321 posts? CHEATER! We all know how to count!
Posting from inside a Kerbal Spacestation is, as I'm sure you're aware, cheating. We non-cheaters either post from the surface of a celestial body or not at all.
Banned for posting from a planet we've never heard of. (ruralamerica? Sounds weird. Like dres, or eeloo.)

Using an alien as a profile image? CHEATER! ALIENS DON'T EXIST!

(in case you did not get it, we're kerbals. your profile image is a human.)

Edited April 23, 2015 by windows_x_seven
You have a alien as a avatar AND you have a weird shape in your sig. CHEATER!

"Location: Kerbin, Mun, Minmus [...]"

CHEATER! YOU CANNOT BE AT MULTIPLE PLACES AT ONCE!

You didn't seem to notice the "or" which implies that I meant one of those locations, not all of them. Cheater for not understanding!

You have a alien as a avatar AND you have a weird shape in your sig. CHEATER!

Vostok 6 in your sig....that's actually pretty cool. So. Cheater for not giving me something to accuse you of!
A enderman? CHEATER! You cannot teleport away to the mun!
MLP? Definitely cheating. Especially with a KSP helmet.
Are you not persistently listening to classical music? CHEATER!!!!!!!

Are you not persistently listening to classical music? CHEATER!!!!!!!

If classic rock counts as classical than I listen to it all the time. Cheater for false accusations!
That looks like an emote, which is cheating. Probably.
42 more posts than me? cheater! How could you have the answer to everything more posts than me without cheating!
Cheating for repetitively calling every a cheater soon after they post

location

aperture enrichment center

cheater! It's filled with deadly neurotoxin! How can you be alive?
Kenny that's how and it not filled with nurotoxin so cheater
Sorting Jeb's junkyard? CHEATER! Only boosters are allowed to do that!
Named after a shuttle AAAND a apollo mission's service module name? CHEEATA!
Only 49 posts? Any number less than 500 is cheating!
02 as in 2 oxygen moulicules? Which when breathed in cause higher blood pressure and increased heart rate? Cheater
Spelling molecules wrong? CHEATER!!!!!
Grammar ....-ing? CHEATER!
